import{themes_data}from'../assets/themes/themes_data';export var themes={themes_data:themes_data,getStyle:function getStyle(element,property){return window.getComputedStyle(element).getPropertyValue("--"+property);},loadThemes:function loadThemes(){// localStorageTheme
var lcStTm=localStorage.getItem("theme");var newTheme=lcStTm?JSON.parse(lcStTm):this.themes_data.dark;this.setTheme(newTheme);},setTheme:function setTheme(theme){var html=document.querySelector("html");html.style.setProperty("--bgc",theme.bgc);html.style.setProperty("--hover",theme.hover);html.style.setProperty("--border",theme.border);html.style.setProperty("--text-color",theme.textColor);this.save(theme);},save:function save(theme){localStorage.setItem("theme",JSON.stringify(theme));}};
